About Us

Founded in 2008, Nimble Academy has gained a trusted reputation for nurturing some of the best young minds from Greenwood High, NPS, Gear ,Indus International,TISB,Inventure Academy, Innisfree, Sri Kumarns, Valley School and DPS
We are passionate about doing every activity with the child in the mind, building relationships, learning and sharing continuously.We have unique programmes to develop...

  • Computational Thinking .
  • Analytical abilitiy and Logical thinking .
  • Visual memory, Concentration and Confidence .

Coding

@ Code Studio kids learn to code through our engaging curriculum that teaches the art of problem solving, logic and teamwork

Mathematics

The aim of this program is to change the view that most of the students have about mathematics, which portrays it as being an extremely difficult subject.

Courses

Popular Courses

Web Development: Age 11+ years

Website Design

Develop beautiful and interactive websites using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. In this coding course, kids learn HTML/CSS and Java Script programming in a fun gamified way while making a real website!

Game Devlopment: Age 9 to 12 years

STOP playing games and START making them!

Kids learn how to embrace both art and technology with game making. The goal of this course is to expose kids to coding and computer science concepts throgh game making

Intro to programming: 6 to 8 years

MIT-Scratch

Best way to introduce your child to the creative world of animations and stories in a fun and interactive way.In this course, students learn building blocks of coding on Scratch by creating interactive stories and animations

Courses

Popular Courses

Python: Age 13+ years

Python Programming

Learn the easiest and most powerful text-based language in the world. In this coding course, Students build applications using programming concepts in one of the most powerful text-based languages

Ganaka: Age 6 to 10 years

GANAKA

Ganaka at Nimble Academy is a Abacus based MATH program for holistic brain development of children.This program helps to improve speed writing,focus and concentration of your child in addition to solving math problems quickly with good accuracy.

CHESS

BRAIN THE WINNER IN CHESS

Parts of your brain grow as you learn new skills. How does one’s brain change while learning chess? Researchers and academicians alike are increasingly finding chess to be a brain feeder that can lift IQ levels.
